gore.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if an animal gores someone, it wounds them with its horns or tusks
gore.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He was attacked and gored by a bull.
gore.translation[0].definitions[0].note_: Gore is often used in the passive
gore.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: thick dark blood that has flowed from a wound
gore.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He likes movies with plenty of blood and gore  (=violence).
